Package MobilePlan.entities

Class Connection

  • java.lang.Object
    • MobilePlan.entities.Connection
  • public class Connection
extends java.lang.Object
    A connection, aka a call between two contracts. A "phone call".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private MobilePhoneContract callee
      The one who is contacted (and NOT charged).
      private MobilePhoneContract caller
      The one who initiates the connection (and who is charged).
      private DateTime dateTime
      The date and time when this connection was established.
      private ConnectionType type
      The type of connection.
      private int units
      The units it counts.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Connection​(MobilePhoneContract caller, MobilePhoneContract callee, ConnectionType type, DateTime dt, int units)
      Creates a connection of a specified type between of a specified caller to a specified callee of specified units and on a specified date and time.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

    • Field Detail

      • caller

        private final MobilePhoneContract caller
        The one who initiates the connection (and who is charged).

      • callee

        private final MobilePhoneContract callee
        The one who is contacted (and NOT charged).

      • type

        private final ConnectionType type
        The type of connection.

      • units

        private final int units
        The units it counts. The units are converted to monetary costs according to the pricing model of the contract under which the connection was established.

      • dateTime

        private final DateTime dateTime
        The date and time when this connection was established.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Connection

        public Connection​(MobilePhoneContract caller,
                  MobilePhoneContract callee,
                  ConnectionType type,
                  DateTime dt,
                  int units)
        Creates a connection of a specified type between of a specified caller to a specified callee of specified units and on a specified date and time. Adds this connection to both, the caller and the callee. For any invalid arguments (null arguments, zero or less units) an IllegalArgumentException with a custom message is thrown.
        Parameters:
        caller - the one who initated the connection, not null
        callee - the one who is contacted by the connection, not null
        type - the type of the connection to create
        dt - the date and time when this connection was established, not null
        units - the units of the connection to create
